title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Week 4 in the NFL. Which teams' play calling did he take issue with? Ross Tucker made his weekly appearance and discussed how defenses react when their offense isn't playing well and vice versa. And NFL Insider Tom Pelissero discusses the changes that will be made because of Tua's concussions. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Week 4 in the NFL. Which teams' play calling did he take issue with? Ross Tucker made his weekly appearance and discussed how defenses react when their offense isn't playing well and vice versa. And NFL Insider Tom Pelissero discusses the changes that will be made because of Tua's concussions. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
